metadata.title: Wednesday, 13th November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health how many women clubs in Lukulu West Parliamentary Constituency have been funded in 2013.

parts: (a)    when the construction of Lunga Clinic in Kasempa Parliamentary Constituency will be completed;
(b)    when the Clinic will be officially opened; and
(c)    when the construction of a district hospital in Kasempa will commence.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when Sikongo Boarding High School will be opened.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure ): Committee of Supply:  Resumption of Debate: (Head 13/01: under consideration): (The Minister of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs). Heads 13/02, 13/03, 13/04, 13/05, 13/06, 14/01, 14/02, 14/03, 14/04, 14/05, 14/06, 14/07, 85/01, 85/02, 85/03, 85/04, 85/07, 85/08, 85/09, 85/10, 68/01, 68/02, 68/03, 68/04, 34/01, 26/01, 26/02, 26/03 and 26/04 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 13    -    Ministry of Chiefs and Traditional Affairs Head 14    -    Ministry of Mines, Energy and Water Development Head 85    -    Ministry of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection Head 68    -    Ministry of Tourism and Art Head 34    -    Human Rights Commission Head 26    -    Ministry of Information and Broadcasting
